title: Firm Reimage Itself To Avoid Confusion With Extremist Group
teaser: Isis, the mobile Wallet platform, wants to avoid confusion with ISIS, the acronym for the Islamic State of Iraq and Syria. Isis' CEO noted rebranding isn't easy, but it's in the firm's best interest.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
